description: This was made in conjunction with my Interactive Media Specialist program where I worked in a group of 3 as a full-stack developer and project manager. The success of the project was executed by setting clear goals and having open communication about problems or enhancements. My main contributions were creating the branding, layouts, managing the project and building out sections of the GUI.
